Description: The BugHerd app sits on top of your website and lets you log a bug instantaneously. BugHerd feedback will be pinned to the issue, like a sticky-note, enabling the developer to access it directly from the webpage at any time.
Name: BugHerd

Methods.Name: List Projects
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Projects.

Methods.Name: Get Project
Methods.Description: Returns details of the specified Project.

Methods.Name: Create Project
Methods.Description: Create a new Project in BugHerd.

Methods.Name: Add Member
Methods.Description: Add a Member to a Project.

Methods.Name: Add Guest
Methods.Description: Add a Guest to a Project.

Methods.Name: Delete Project
Methods.Description: Delete the selected project

Methods.Name: Update Project
Methods.Description: Update the details of a Project.

Methods.Name: Get Organisation
Methods.Description: Get details of the Organisation.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Users

Methods.Name: List Members
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Members

Methods.Name: List Guests
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Guests.

Methods.Name: List Tasks
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Tasks for the specified Project.

Methods.Name: Get Task
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified Task.

Methods.Name: List Updted Tasks
Methods.Description: Returns a list of updted Tasks for the specified Project.

Methods.Name: List New Tasks
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new Tasks for the specified Project.

Methods.Name: Create Task
Methods.Description: Creates a new Task for a Project.

Methods.Name: List Comments
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Comments.

Methods.Name: Create Comment
Methods.Description: Adds a comment onto a Project Task.

Methods.Name: List Webhooks
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Webhooks.

Methods.Name: Create Webhook
Methods.Description: Creates a webhook for the specified event

Methods.Name: Delete Webhook
Methods.Description: Deletes the specified Webhook.

Methods.Name: List Attachments
Methods.Description: Returns a list of attachements to a project tasks.

Methods.Name: Task Created
Methods.Description: Notification that a new Task hsa been created.

Methods.Name: Task Updated
Methods.Description: Notification that a Task has been updated.

Methods.Name: New Comment
Methods.Description: Triggered when a new Comment is added.

Methods.Name: Task Deleted
Methods.Description: Notificaiton that a Task has been deleted.
